Package it.polimi.is23am10.server.network.virtualview

Class VirtualPlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.is23am10.server.network.virtualview.VirtualPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class VirtualPlayer extends Object implements Serializable
A virtual view with the state of a player, downscoped to what is essential for the client to view
